change_text: Deploy payments API hotfix to production at 02:00Z. Rollback plan is documented.
Apply customer database schema change in production without rollback details.
UI color update for internal dashboard in staging environment.
Rotate auth certificates in production. Contact: oncall@example.com
Restart notification worker in production. Rollback available.
Enable new checkout feature flag in production and validate with canary.
Tune cache TTL values in staging for search service.
Patch identity service dependencies in production, rollback unknown.
Move analytics cron schedule by 10 minutes in production, low impact expected.
Database reindex on core orders table in production during business hours.
